system.availability: Allow one to temporaily speed up time for themselves. When activated, user can take two Full Actions in a single round (and can make two combat actions instead of one). But in the next round cannot take any actions, and suffers a level of fatigue. Doesn't stack with similar effects.
system.cost: A Rare Archeotech Item, They are Good Craftsmanship by default, with no Poor or Common Craftsmanship versions. (if there are, they're probably fake)
